4. Metadata: for microscopy OME may be useful metadata standard to use https://fairsharing.org/search?q=ome
6. Preservation: Please note that KU Leuven policy expects preservation of all relevant data for 10 years, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/website-old/rdm-policy
7. Sharing: KU Leuven now also has an institutional repository that you can use for data sharing: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
